page.title: 10TRANSPORT
page.content: The area is served by road transport -the nearest railway station is about 1km.outside.The M6 motorway passes through,but there are no junctions.There is also a canal,but this sees leisure use only. Public transport is provided by W.M.P.T.E.Bus services are: 28-goes to Bordesley Green.Does not serve the city centre.I use the 28 to go to Erdington.(Claire) 33-goes to Kingstanding.A good service in the rush hour. 46-goes to Pheasey Estate.Not very frequent outside the rush hour. 51,52-51 runs to Walsall;52 serves Beeches Estate.Used by children from Perry Beeches School. 90,91-serve Kingstanding via Handsworth. You can see we have a good choice of buses.
